CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 5, 1958, pg. 3 reads: "5. "Shorts" Davis was greeted with waves of applause for this show-stopping dance act. Walter Harper at the piano; Dolores Ware, singer, and the Harper band furnished some rocking music."
TitMainTitle: The Harper band performing with "Shorts" Davis dancing, Walter Harper at the piano, and singer Dolores Ware in Syria Mosque for the 1958 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
